reviewText: It's disappointing that only seasons 1-6 are available and was only able to find it on dvd wish it was available on blu-ray. I love this series! This set was nice because each season fits in a dvd case so its not like its a bulky dvd case like some other series pack their series. I got this when it was on a lightning deal so I got a decent price for it. I've been wanting it for so long. very happy.
summary: An Awesome series if only all seasons were available
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6

reviewText: I got these on an hourly deal that was too good to pass up, my only wish was that is Blu-ray instead of DVD. Nonetheless, these will provide entertainment for years to come.
summary: What's not to say about "King of the Hill?"
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6

reviewText: Mike Judge is a genius.  Beavis and Butthead were the best, BEST cartoon of the 90's.  King of the Hill ended the decade and began the new one with its over the top comedy that somehow was realistic.  This show will live in cartoon history as one of the greats up there with South Park and The Simpsons.
summary: YOU FAILED ENGLISH, YOU SPEAK ENGLISH
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6

reviewText: item received fast and in perfect condition. it is a Christmas present for my 15 year old son. he watches the tv show and wanted the set of dvds.very pleased with transaction.
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6

reviewText: This animated series was great during the first six seasons.  It's funny, well written, and has always got a feel good payoff.  With extremely few exceptions, all episodes in this collection can be watched with the kids.  Even though it may be considered adult humor, it is harmless and fun.  Animation these days uses the art to go to the extremes.  Mike Judge and gang created an animation series that's genius lies in its simplicity and fun!
summary: King Of The Hill Is Good Family Fun
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6

reviewText: I am a huge fan of King of the Hill and I wanted to see it from the beginning so I bought the series
Title: King of the Hill - Seasons 1 - 6
